articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: India's Asia Cup 2023 Squad: No KL Rahul, Shreyas Iyer In 15-Member Team Picked By Experts - NDTV Sports
articles.description: KL Rahul and Shreyas Iyer are in contention for a spot in India's Asia Cup 2023 squad.
articles.content: As the wait for the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) to announce the Asia Cup 2023 squad continues, some former cricketers including Ravi Shastri, MSK Prasad, and Sandip Patil have reveal… [+1943 chars]
